alert.note: Alert for Grant; Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:23PM EDT until June 25 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Grant County in northern Kentucky... Central Owen County in northern Kentucky... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 722 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Owenton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Williamstown, Owenton, Corinth, Stewartsville, Elk Lake, Cherry Grove, Long Ridge, Natlee, New Liberty, Twin Bridges, Keefer, Camp Northward, Needmore, New Columbus, Holbrook, Elmer Davis Lake, Lawrenceville and Cordova. This includes I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 144 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northern Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northern Kentucky.
